title: Was she a transsexual woman convicted of sexually assaulting a young girl in the bathroom?
subtitle: A series of written articles attempted to link the rape of a 10-year-old girl in her home to laws that allow transgender people to use doves that correspond to their identity.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A transgender woman raped a young girl in a women ' s bathroom because bills passed allowed transgender people to use sex-appropriate bathrooms.
